name: Golf/Out
description:
This game was made for Brackeys Game Jame 2021.2

Golf/Out is a golf minigame were some platforms have differents effect such as making the ball bounce, stick or duplicate itself.

Controll:

Mouse : Aim and adjust power

Space : Shoot

R : restart level

Escape : Pause Menu

Advice: Don't play in full screen or you won't be able to aim properly
